answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects various types of data, indicating the declaration of data collection.
reply.reference: The following provides examples of the type of information that we collect from you and how we use that information. URL: http://www.tree-bath.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects customer user information, account information (customer user), client account information, cookies and first-party tracking, distance information, email interconnectivity, employment-related information, demographic information, and cookies and third-party tracking.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy document outlines the various types of data that the app collects from its users.
reply.reference: Various types of data collected including customer user information, account information (customer user), client account information, cookies and first-party tracking, distance information, email interconnectivity, employment-related information, demographic information, and cookies and third-party tracking. URL: http://www.tree-bath.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use by stating that they use information for various purposes such as identifying users, providing services, improving offerings, promoting security, conducting analytics, responding to inquiries, sending marketing materials, and managing relationships.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the purposes for which data is collected and used, demonstrating transparency in the app's data practices.
reply.reference: To identify you when you visit our websites. To provide our Services. To improve our Services and offerings. To promote the security of our Site and Services. To conduct analytics. To respond to inquiries related to support, employment opportunities, or other requests. To send marketing and promotional materials including information relating to our products, services, sales, or promotions, or those of our business partners. For internal administrative purposes, as well as to manage our relationships. Although the sections above describe our primary purpose in collecting your information, in many situations we have more than one purpose. URL: http://www.tree-bath.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or request deletion of data by contacting the provided address.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users can request deletion of their personal information by contacting the provided address. The company will comply with such requests if required by law.
reply.reference: You may, however, request information about how long we keep a specific type of information, or request that we delete your personal information by contacting us at the address described below. If required by law we will grant a request to delete information, but you should note that in many situations we must keep your personal information to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, or for another one of our business purposes. Objection to Certain Processing. You may object to our use or disclosure of your personal information by contacting us at the address described below. URL: http://www.tree-bath.com/privacy-policy

source_documents.excerpt: Your Personal Information. Typically we retain your personal information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. You may, however, request information about how long we keep a specific type of information, or request that we delete your personal information by contacting us at the address described below. If required by law we will grant a request to delete information, but you should note that in...

fulfillment of orders.
YOUR CHOICES
You can make the following choices regarding your personal information:
Access To Your Personal Information. You may request access to your personal information by contacting us at the address described below. If required by law, upon request, we will grant you reasonable access to the personal information that we have about you. We will provide this information in a portable format, if required. reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app does share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing information with service providers, corporate affiliates, and other unaffiliated third parties under certain circumstances.
reply.reference: Affiliates and Acquisitions. We may share information with our corporate affiliates... Other Disclosures with Your Consent. We may ask if you would like us to share your information with other unaffiliated third parties... Service Providers. We share your information with service providers. URL: http://www.tree-bath.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with its affiliates, acquisitions, and with third parties based on user consent.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines that data is shared with several categories of entities including affiliates, acquisitions, third party applications/websites, payment processors, and service fulfillment companies.
reply.reference: Affiliates and Acquisitions. We may share information with our corporate affiliates (e.g., parent company, sister companies, subsidiaries, joint ventures, or other companies under common control). If another company acquires, or plans to acquire, our company, business, or our assets, we will also share information with that company, including at the negotiation stage. Other Disclosures with Your Consent. We may ask if you would like us to share your information with other unaffiliated third parties who are not described elsewhere in this policy. Payment Information. If you use or register for certain Services, you may need to provide payment information, such as a credit card number, type and expiration date. Treebath does not store credit card credit or debit card (“Payment Card”) data entered on our Services. Apple and Google collect Payment Card data with respect to app purchases made through the Apps, and our payment ...
